Title: Loot
Writer: Ray Galton (screenplay), Alan Simpson (screenplay), Joe Orton (play)
Actors: Richard Attenborough, Lee Remick, Hywel Bennett, Milo O'Shea
Plot: Based on the play by Joe Orton, this film follows the adventures of two pals who have pulled off a bank robbery and have to hide the loot. Fortunately one of them works in a funeral parlor and they have a coffin to spare. Then there's the gold-digger nurse and the gonad-grabber detective and a host of other wonderful characters.
